sentences.zh: 中宮天極星，其一明者，太一常居也；

translations.literal: Central Palace Heaven's Pole star, its one bright one, Tai Yi constantly resides;
Beside three stars three dukes, or called son attendants.

sentences.zh: 後句四星，末大星正妃，餘三星後宮之屬也。

translations.literal: Back curved four stars, last big star chief consort, remaining three stars rear palace attendants.
Surrounding barrier guard twelve stars, feudal ministers.
All called Purple Palace.

Central Palace Heaven's Pole star, its one bright one, Tai Yi constantly resides; Beside three stars three dukes, or called son attendants. Back curved four stars, last big star chief consort, remaining three stars rear palace attendants. Surrounding barrier guard twelve stars, feudal ministers. All called Purple Palace.

sentences.zh: 前列直斗口三星，隨北端兌，若見若不，曰陰德，或曰天一。

translations.literal: Front row straight Dipper mouth three stars, follow north end Dui, appear not appear, called Yin Virtue, or called Tian Yi.

sentences.zh: 紫宮左三星曰天槍，右五星曰天棓，後六星絕漢抵營室，曰閣道。

translations.literal: Purple Palace left three stars called Heaven Spear, right five stars called Heaven Club, back six stars cross Milky Way reach Camp Room, called Pavilion Way.

Front row straight Dipper mouth three stars, follow north end Dui, appear not appear, called Yin Virtue, or called Tian Yi. Purple Palace left three stars called Heaven Spear, right five stars called Heaven Club, back six stars cross Milky Way reach Camp Room, called Pavilion Way.

sentences.zh: 北斗七星，所謂「旋、璣、玉衡以齊七政」。

translations.literal: North Dipper seven stars, what is called 'Xuan Ji Yu Heng to align seven governance'.

sentences.zh: 杓攜龍角，衡殷南斗，魁枕參首。

translations.literal: Ladle carries Dragon horn, balance presses Southern Dipper, handle pillows Shen head.
Use dusk establish ladle;
Ladle, from China southwest.
Night half establish balance;
Balance, Yin central states He Ji between.
Level dawn establish handle;
Handle, Hai Dai northeast.

sentences.zh: 斗為帝車，運于中央，臨制四鄉。

translations.literal: Dipper is Emperor carriage, moves at center, overlooks controls four directions.

sentences.zh: 分陰陽，建四時，均五行，移節度，定諸紀，皆系於斗。

translations.literal: Divides yin yang, establishes four seasons, equalizes five phases, shifts measures, determines various records, all tied to Dipper.

North Dipper seven stars, what is called 'Xuan Ji Yu Heng to align seven governance'. Ladle carries Dragon horn, balance presses Southern Dipper, handle pillows Shen head. Use dusk establish ladle; Ladle, from China southwest. Night half establish balance; Balance, Yin central states He Ji between. Level dawn establish handle; Handle, Hai Dai northeast. Dipper is Emperor carriage, moves at center, overlooks controls four directions. Divides yin yang, establishes four seasons, equalizes five phases, shifts measures, determines various records, all tied to Dipper.

sentences.zh: 斗魁戴匡六星曰文昌宮：一曰上將，二曰次將，三曰貴相，四曰司命，五曰司中，六曰司祿。

translations.literal: Dipper handle wears barrier six stars called Wen Chang Palace: one called Upper General, two called Vice General, three called Noble Chancellor, four called Si Ming, five called Si Zhong, six called Si Lu.
In Dipper handle midst, noble person's prison.

sentences.zh: 魁下六星，兩兩相比者，名曰三能。

translations.literal: Handle below six stars, two two compared, named Three Neng.
Three Neng color even, ruler minister harmonious;
Not even, become contrary perverse.
Auxiliary star bright close, auxiliary minister intimate strong;
Distant small, distant weak.

Dipper handle wears barrier six stars called Wen Chang Palace: one called Upper General, two called Vice General, three called Noble Chancellor, four called Si Ming, five called Si Zhong, six called Si Lu. Auxiliary star bright close, auxiliary minister intimate strong; Distant small, distant weak.

sentences.zh: 杓端有兩星：一內為矛，招搖；

translations.literal: Ladle end has two stars: one inner spear, Zhao Yao;
One outer shield, Heaven Peak.

sentences.zh: 有句圜十五星，屬杓，曰賤人之牢。

translations.literal: Has curved circle fifteen stars, belongs ladle, called lowly person's prison.

sentences.zh: 其牢中星實則囚多，虛則開出。

translations.literal: Its prison middle star solid then prisoners many, empty then open out.

Ladle end has two stars: one inner spear, Zhao Yao; One outer shield, Heaven Peak. Has curved circle fifteen stars, belongs ladle, called lowly person's prison. Its prison middle star solid then prisoners many, empty then open out.

sentences.zh: 天一、槍、棓、矛、盾動搖，角大，兵起。

translations.literal: Tian Yi, spear, club, spear, shield move shake, horns large, troops arise.
Tian Yi, spear, club, spear, shield move shake, horns large, troops arise.
East Palace Azure Dragon, Fang, Xin.

sentences.zh: 心為明堂，大星天王，前後星子屬。

translations.literal: Xin is Bright Hall, big star Heaven King, front back stars son attendants.
Not want straight, straight then Heaven King loses plan.
Fang is Storehouse, called Heaven Driver.
Its yin, right trace horse.
Beside has two stars called collar;
North one star called fan.
Northeast curved twelve stars called banner.
Banner middle four stars Heaven Market;
Middle six stars called Market Tower.
Market middle stars numerous solid;
Its empty then waste.
Fang south numerous stars called Cavalry Official.

Left horn, Li;
Right horn, General.
Big horn, Heaven King imperial court.

sentences.zh: 其兩旁各有三星，鼎足句之，曰攝提。

translations.literal: Its two sides each have three stars, tripod feet hooked, called She Ti.

sentences.zh: 攝提者，直斗杓所指，以建時節，故曰「攝提格」。

translations.literal: She Ti, straight Dipper ladle pointed, to establish time sections, thus called 'She Ti Ge'.
Kang is sparse temple, governs illness.
Its south north two big stars, called South Gate.
Di is heaven root, governs epidemics.

Wei is nine sons, called ruler minister;
Expelled distant, not harmonious.
Ji is proud guest, called mouth tongue.

Fire offends guards Jue, then has battle.
Fang Xin, kings hate it.

Middle, main gate;
Gate left right, wing gates.
Gate inner six stars, feudal lords.
Its inner five stars, five emperors seats.

sentences.zh: 後聚一十五星，蔚然，曰郎位；

translations.literal: Back gather fifteen stars, luxuriant, called attendant positions;
Beside one big star, general position.

sentences.zh: 月、五星順入，軌道，司其出，所守，天子所誅也。

translations.literal: Moon five stars follow enter, track path, oversee their exit, their guard, son of heaven punishes.

sentences.zh: 其逆入，若不軌道，以所犯命之；

translations.literal: Its contrary enter, if not track path, with what offends determines;

sentences.zh: 中坐，成形，皆群下從謀也。

translations.literal: Middle seat, forms shape, all ministers below follow plot.
Gold fire especially severe.

sentences.zh: 廷藩西有隋星五，曰少微，士大夫。

translations.literal: Court barrier west has Sui stars five, called Shao Wei, scholar officials.
Quan, Xuan Yuan.
Xuan Yuan, yellow dragon body.
Front big star, female lord image;
Beside small stars, driver rear palace attendants.
Moon five stars guard offend, like Heng divine.

Dong Jing for water affairs.
Its west curved stars called Yue.
Yue north, north river;
South, south river;
Two rivers heaven gate between for passes bridges.
Yu Gui, ghost shrine affairs;
Middle white for hostage.

sentences.zh: 火守南北河，兵起，穀不登。

translations.literal: Fire guards north south rivers, troops arise, grain not abundant.

sentences.zh: 故德成衡，觀成潢，傷成鉞，禍成井，誅成質。

translations.literal: Thus virtue completes Heng, observe completes Kuang, wound completes Yue, calamity completes Jing, execute completes hostage.

Liu for bird spout, governs wood grass.
Seven Stars, neck, for round official.
Governs urgent affairs.
Zhang, Su, for kitchen, governs banquet guests.
Yi for feathers, governs distant guests.

Zhen for carriage, governs wind.

sentences.zh: 其旁有一小星，曰長沙，星星不欲明；

translations.literal: Its beside has one small star, called Chang Sha, stars not want bright;

sentences.zh: 明與四星等，若五星入軫中，兵大起。

translations.literal: Bright with four stars equal, if five stars enter Zhen midst, troops greatly arise.
Zhen south numerous stars called heaven storehouse tower;
Storehouse has five chariots.

sentences.zh: 車星角若益眾，及不具，無處車馬。

translations.literal: Chariot stars horns if increase numerous, and not complete, no place chariots horses.

West Palace Xian Chi, called heaven five Kuang.
Five Kuang, five emperors chariot lodges.
Fire enters, drought;
Metal, troops;
Water, floods.
Middle has three pillars;
Pillars not complete, troops arise.

Lou for gathering crowds.
Wei for Heaven Granary.
Its south numerous stars called storehouse accumulations.

sentences.zh: 昴曰髦頭，胡星也，為白衣會。

translations.literal: Mao called mane head, Hu star, for white clothes assembly.

sentences.zh: 畢曰罕車，為邊兵，主弋獵。

translations.literal: Bi called sparse vehicle, for border troops, governs shooting hunting.
Its big star beside small star for attached ear.

sentences.zh: 附耳搖動，有讒亂臣在側。

translations.literal: Attached ear shakes moves, has slanderous chaos minister at side.
Mao Bi between for Heaven Street.
Its yin, yin states;
Yang, yang states.

Shen for White Tiger.
Three stars straight, this is balance stone.

sentences.zh: 下有三星，兌，曰罰，為斬艾事。

translations.literal: Below has three stars, Dui, called punishment, for cutting weed affairs.
Its outer four stars, left right shoulders thighs.

sentences.zh: 小三星隅置，曰觜觿，為虎首，主葆旅事。

translations.literal: Small three stars corner placed, called Zi Xi, for tiger head, governs guard travel affairs.
Its south has four stars, called Heaven Toilet.
Toilet below one star, called Heaven Arrow.
Arrow yellow then auspicious;
Blue white black, inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 其西有句曲九星，三處羅：一曰天旗，二曰天苑，三曰九游。

translations.literal: Its west has curved nine stars, three places spread: one called Heaven Flag, two called Heaven Garden, three called Nine Roam.
Its east has big star called Wolf.
Wolf horns change color, many bandits thieves.
Below has four stars called Arc, straight Wolf.

sentences.zh: 狼比地有大星，曰南極老人。

translations.literal: Wolf compared to earth has big star, called South Pole Old Man.
Old Man appears, governance peaceful;
Not appears, troops arise.

sentences.zh: 常以秋分時候之于南郊。

translations.literal: Constantly at autumn equinox time observe at south suburb.

North Palace Black Tortoise, Xu, Wei.
Wei for covering house;
Xu for weeping crying affairs.

sentences.zh: 其南有眾星，曰羽林天軍。

translations.literal: Its south has numerous stars, called Feather Forest Heaven Army.
Army west for rampart, or called Yue.
Beside has one big star for North Fall.

sentences.zh: 北落若微亡，軍星動角益希，及五星犯北落，入軍，軍起。

translations.literal: North Fall if faint lost, army stars move horns more sparse, and five planets offend North Fall, enter army, army arises.
Fire metal water especially severe: fire, army worry;
Water, flood calamity;
Wood earth, army auspicious.

sentences.zh: 危東六星，兩兩相比，曰司空。

translations.literal: Wei east six stars, two two compared, called Si Kong.

sentences.zh: 營室為清廟，曰離宮、閣道。

translations.literal: Camp Room for pure temple, called Li Palace, Pavilion Way.
Milky Way middle four stars, called Heaven Driver.
Beside one star, called Wang Liang.
Wang Liang whips horses, chariots cavalry fill fields.
Beside has eight stars, cross Milky Way, called Heaven Kuang.
Heaven Kuang beside, Jiang star.
Jiang star moves, people ford water.

Chui Chou four stars, in Wei south.

sentences.zh: 匏瓜，有青黑星守之，魚鹽貴。

translations.literal: Pao Gua, has blue black star guards it, fish salt expensive.
Chui Chou four stars, in Wei south. Pao Gua, has blue black star guards it, fish salt expensive.
South Dipper for temple, its north Jian star.
Jian star, banner.
Qian Niu for sacrificial animal.
Its north He Gu.
He Gu big star, upper general;
Left right, left right generals.
Wu Nu, its north Zhi Nu.
Zhi Nu, heaven girl grandson.

sentences.zh: 察日、月之行以揆歲星順逆。

translations.literal: Observe sun moon conduct to measure year star forward backward.
Called eastern wood, governs spring, called Jia Yi.
Righteousness lost, punishment exits year star.
Year star advance retreat, with its lodges determines state.

sentences.zh: 所在國不可伐，可以罰人。

translations.literal: Where state cannot attack, can punish person.

sentences.zh: 其趨舍而前曰贏，退舍曰縮。

translations.literal: Its hurry lodges and advance called advance, retreat lodges called retreat.
Advance, its state has troops not return;

sentences.zh: 縮，其國有憂，將亡，國傾敗。

translations.literal: Retreat, its state has worry, will perish, state overturn defeat.

sentences.zh: 其所在，五星皆從而聚於一舍，其下之國可以義致天下。

translations.literal: Its where, five stars all follow gather at one lodge, its below state can with righteousness bring all under heaven.

translations.literal: With She Ti Ge year: year yin left goes in Yin, year star right turns dwells Chou.

sentences.zh: 正月，與斗、牽牛晨出東方，名曰監德。

translations.literal: First month, with Dou, Qian Niu morning out eastern, named Jian De.
Color blue blue has light.
Its loses order, has response appears Liu.
Year early, floods;
Late, drought.

sentences.zh: 歲星出，東行十二度，百日而止，反逆行；

translations.literal: Year star out, east goes twelve degrees, hundred days then stops, contrary goes;
Contrary goes eight degrees, hundred days, again east goes.

sentences.zh: 歲行三十度十六分度之七，率日行十二分度之一，十二歲而周天。

translations.literal: Year goes thirty degrees sixteen fen degree seven, rate day goes twelve fen degree one, twelve years circles heaven.
Out constantly eastern, with morning;
Enters western, uses dusk.

sentences.zh: 單閼歲：歲陰在卯，星居子。

translations.literal: Dan Yan year: year yin in Mao, star dwells Zi.

sentences.zh: 以二月與婺女、虛、危晨出，曰降入。

translations.literal: With second month and Wu Nu, Xu, Wei morning out, called Jiang Ru.
Great has light.
Its loses order, has response appears Zhang.
Its year great floods.

translations.literal: Zhi Xu year: year yin in Chen, star dwells Hai.

sentences.zh: 以三月［居］與營室、東壁晨出，曰青章。

translations.literal: With third month and Ying Shi, Dong Bi morning out, called Qing Zhang.
Blue blue very bright.
Its loses order;
Has response appears Zhen.
Year early, drought;
Late, floods.

sentences.zh: 大荒駱歲：歲陰在巳，星居戌。

translations.literal: Da Huang Luo year: year yin in Si, star dwells Xu.

sentences.zh: 以四月與奎、婁［胃昴］晨出，曰跰踵。

translations.literal: With fourth month and Kui, Lou morning out, called Bo Zhong.
Bear bear red color, has light.
Its loses order, has response appears Kang.

sentences.zh: 敦牂歲：歲陰在午，星居酉。

translations.literal: Dun Zang year: year yin in Wu, star dwells You.

sentences.zh: 以五月與胃、昴、畢晨出，曰開明。

translations.literal: With fifth month and Wei, Mao, Bi morning out, called Kai Ming.
Bright bright has light.
Cease troops;
Only beneficial to duke king, not beneficial to managing troops.
Its loses order, has response appears Fang.
Year early, drought;
Late, floods.

sentences.zh: 協洽歲：歲陰在未，星居申。

translations.literal: Xie Xia year: year yin in Wei, star dwells Shen.

sentences.zh: 以六月與觜觿、參晨出，曰長列。

translations.literal: With sixth month and Zi Xi, Shen morning out, called Long Column.
Bright bright has light.
Beneficial to march troops.
Its loses order, has response appears Ji.

translations.literal: With seventh month and Dong Jing, Yu Gui morning out, called Great Sound.

Its loses order, has response appears Qian Niu.

translations.literal: Zuo E year: year yin in You, star dwells Wu.

sentences.zh: 以八月與柳、七星、張晨出，曰（為）長王。

translations.literal: With eighth month and Liu, Seven Stars, Zhang morning out, called Long Wang.
Zuo zuo has spikes.
State its prosperous, ripe grain.
Its loses order, has response appears Wei.

sentences.zh: ［曰大章］有旱而昌，有女喪，民疾。

sentences.zh: 閹茂歲：歲陰在戌，星居巳。

translations.literal: Yan Mao year: year yin in Xu, star dwells Si.

sentences.zh: 以九月與翼、軫晨出，曰天睢。

translations.literal: With ninth month and Yi, Zhen morning out, called Heaven Sui.
White color greatly bright.
Its loses order, has response appears Dong Bi.
